venue.name: Town of Cumberland: HAYDEN EDW J PUBLIC LIBRARY

item.description:
You are invited to view an Exhibition of Artwork created by Germaine Gerie Krobath

and her Children and Adult Students. 

The artwork is from a variety of classes

 including watercolor, acrylic, oil and mixed media.

 

Everyone is welcome to come

Meet the Artists on

Saturday, May 18, 2013, from 2:00 – 4:00 pm

at the Cumberland library Hayden Center.

You will enjoy viewing the variety of styles in the paintings that were created by Germaine’s students.  You are also welcome to view the exhibit during the month of May and June during

 the Book Store hours - Thurs- 5:30pm to 7:30pm, and Sat.- 9:30am to 12:30pm

 

Germaine will be demonstrating the creation of a

 Watercolor Painting

from start to finish on

Saturday May 18, 2013 from  3:00 – 4:00 pm,

at the Cumberland Library Hayden Center.

This is free to all, adults and children.
item.how_to_find_us: The Hayden Center is around the left side of the Library.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Watch a Watercolor Demo and Art Exhibit
